title: Save $100 on this Apple Watch Series 10, plus grab deals from $169
description: Apple Watch deals are heating up at Amazon this week, with a $100 discount in effect on an Apple Watch Series 10 style and prices across the wearable line starting at $169.Amazon cuts prices on the Apple Watch line - Image credit: AppleWe're following a fresh Apple Watch Series 10 price drop at Amazon today, with the Apple Authorized Reseller knocking $100 off the 42mm GPS + Cellular model with a Silver Aluminum Case and Denim Sport Band.Now priced at $399, Amazon states this is a limited-time deal (and stock is limited at press time). Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Apple Watch deals are heating up at Amazon this week, with a $100 discount in effect on an Apple Watch Series 10 style and prices across the wearable line starting at $169.
text: Apple Watch deals are heating up at Amazon this week, with a $100 discount in effect on an Apple Watch Series 10 style and prices across the wearable line starting at $169. We're following a fresh Apple Watch Series 10 price drop at Amazon today, with the Apple Authorized Reseller knocking $100 off the 42mm GPS + Cellular model with a Silver Aluminum Case and Denim Sport Band. Now priced at $399, Amazon states this is a limited-time deal (and stock is limited at press time). Save $100 on Series 10 If you're looking for the cheapest Apple Watch price period, Amazon also has the SE 2 on sale for $169.97, a discount of $80 off MSRP. Grab SE 2 from $169 Rounding out the range, the rugged Apple Watch Ultra 2 is marked down as well, with select Black Titanium Case styles on sale for $739. With the weather warming up, you can track spring activities, including outdoor hikes, with ease. Get Ultra 2 for $739
html:
Apple Watch deals are heating up at Amazon this week, with a $100 discount in effect on an Apple Watch Series 10 style and prices across the wearable line starting at $169.

We're following a fresh Apple Watch Series 10 price drop at Amazon today, with the Apple Authorized Reseller knocking $100 off the 42mm GPS + Cellular model with a Silver Aluminum Case and Denim Sport Band.

Now priced at $399, Amazon states this is a limited-time deal (and stock is limited at press time).

Save $100 on Series 10

If you're looking for the cheapest Apple Watch price period, Amazon also has the SE 2 on sale for $169.97, a discount of $80 off MSRP.

Grab SE 2 from $169

Rounding out the range, the rugged Apple Watch Ultra 2 is marked down as well, with select Black Titanium Case styles on sale for $739. With the weather warming up, you can track spring activities, including outdoor hikes, with ease.

Get Ultra 2 for $739
